summary: This mod replaces the stock music and replaces it with the halo soundtrack (halo 1 to halo 5)
descriptionHtml:
This mod replaces the stock music and replaces it with the halo soundtrack (halo 1 to halo 5) 

it uses the soundtracks from 
Halo 1
Halo 2 
Halo 3
Halo OSDT
Halo Reach 
Halo 4 
Halo 5


It also replaces the main menu theme with the halo reach lone wolf theme. The the mod is very lore friendly in that it uses only orchestral instruments (no electric guitars) 

The tracks will also be appropriate for the situation for example a slow calm song will play while exploring Skyrim where as when fighting a dragon a main heroic theme will play. 

One of the piano themes used for exploring is played by the brilliant Mark Fowler.  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8zvaE70I26g
Please show him support for his brilliant music.  

If you have any issues please report them and if you have any personal requests I dont mind changing the themes around
author: waza117
